name: DD003 - Big Money Marvin
description:
DD003 - Big Money Marvin

Condition - Big Money Marvin suffers from a range of aggression and abandonment issues, given he was once the CEO of Care Crop he has a sizeable fortune and various assets to his name. Marvin is prone to screaming and punching his block walls, we have actually built an inner case to the wall made of 'policeman_iron'... Safe to say this is a very strong metal and of course very fetching. Marvin's human face is long gone and he has fully moulded into a 'Care Plastic' shell, you may not recognise him but if you hear him talk, you will say, 'that is Marvin'. CAUTION!!! Adopting Marvin is seen only for the most brave and kind. He will not like you.

Whoever adopts Marvin will get a framed regal portrait of him in his human flesh days, THIS IS NOT A DRILL, you will get your framed portrait after contacting us with your details. It will be huge.

Dosage - All available drugs. (IV constant) 

Current action - Commit to private (luxury holders only) block on confirmed transaction.
